mapper.select: select m.musicrank as musicrank, m.musicsubject as musicsubject, m.musicvideo as musicvideo, a.albumimg as albumimg, ar.artistname as artistname, a.albumname as ablumname, m.musicnumber as musicnumber from music as m inner join album as a on m.albumnumber=a.albumnumber inner join artist as ar on m.artistnumber=ar.artistnumber
select plyalistNumber from music where usernumber=#{usernumber}
mapper.insert:
insert into music (musicsubject, musicfile, musicvideo, musictitle)
values(#{musicsubject}, #{musicfile}, #{musicvideo}, #{musictitle})
